infobox_data.Ability: Can be toggled as the primary vehicle production structure (if the player have multiplewar factoriesat the same time)
Notes: The more war factories the player have, the faster vehicles are produced
Can be infiltrated for veteran vehicle production

article_tables.title: Standard vehicles
rows:
Resource Vehicle.
Requires Epsilon Ore Refinery
Abilities:
Harvests ore with a capacity of 1000 ores/1500 gems
Cloaked; periodically reveals itself

Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Aircraft.
Abilities:
Fires faster the longer it attacks
Lasher Light Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Rapidly fires the first 4 shells
Mantis Light Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Repairs Mantis Tanks around itself when destroyed
Opus Custom Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Second gun activates when an infantry is onboard
The higher the tier of the passenger, the higher the damage of the second gun

Unmanned Light Walker. Strong vs. Infantry.
Abilities:
Detects cloaked and disguised units
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Repairs vehicles when an Engineer is onboard
Epsilon MCV

Construction Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Radar Spire
Deploys into an Epsilon Construction Yard
Driller APC

Transport Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Radar Spire
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 3 passenger slots
Subterranean

Medium Tank. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Amphibious

Hit-and-Run Vehicle. Strong vs. Armor.
Requires Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Deploy to switch between rapid fire or artillery modes

Medium Tank. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Detects cloaked units
Cloaked
Deploy to switch between auto attack or hold fire modes

Mind Control Monster Tank.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Psychplug
Abilities:
Multiple mind control
Damages itself when controlling more than 3 units

Hovercraft Artillery. Strong vs. Structures.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Psychplug
Abilities:
Reduces speed of heavy infantry and mechanical units by 85%
Speed debuff is stackable.
Mechanical units near primary target are slowed down
Amphibious

Heavy Vehicle. Strong vs. Aircraft (no ground attack).
Requires Pandora Hub with  Psychplug
Carries a Dybbuk-Interceptor to attack aircraft

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Armor, Structures.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Chemplug
Abilities:
Subterranean
Explodes violently when destroyed

Light Artillery. Strong vs. Infantry, Structures.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Chemplug
Abilities:
Reduces the armor of enemy ground units by 10%

Support Vehicle.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Chemplug
Abilities:
Reduces the armor of enemy aircraft by 25%, but cannot directly harm them
Armor debuff is stackable.
Amphibious

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Armor, Aircraft.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Geneplug
Abilities:
Deploy to switch between anti-ground or anti-air modes

Support Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Geneplug
Abilities:
Cloaks nearby units (except itself) when deployed

article_tables.title: Standard aircraft
rows:
Light Aircraft. Strong vs. Infantry, Aircraft.
Requires Radar Spire
Abilities:
Parasite pull disable defenses and power structures
Parasite pull steal credits from Ore Refineries

Medium Aircraft. Strong vs. Structures.
Requires upgraded Pandora Hub

Epic Super-Heavy Aircraft. Strong vs. Everything.
Requires Pandora Hub with  Geneplug
Only one Aerial Fortress Irkalla may be produced at a time.

article_tables.title: Stolen Tech
rows:
Stolen Tech Multirole Vehicle. Strong vs. Armor, Structures.
Requires infiltration of Tech Center and Allied Construction Yard
Requires upgraded Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Steals the weapon of a destroyed enemy vehicle
Stolen weapons permanently replace the default weapon
Can crush vehicles

Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires infiltration of Palace/Battle Lab/Atomheart and Soviet Construction Yard
Requires upgraded Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Subterranean
Repairs damage taken from Tesla weapons

Stolen Tech Gunship. Strong vs. Armor, Aircraft.
Requires infiltration of Cloud Piercer and Foehn Construction Yard
Requires upgraded Pandora Hub
Abilities:
Confusion ray
Confusion field
